name: La Résistance
description:
Controls

  • Move – WASD
  • Interact – E
  • Flashlight – F
  • Shoot – Left Mouse
  • Aim – Right Mouse
  • Sprint – Left Shift
  • Walk – Left Control

Overview

The year is 1944. Your home country of France has been ravaged by war and German occupation. Your town, among many, has been overrun by German soldiers for four years, and now you finally have a way to fight back. The Resistance has come in possession of the Wunderwaffenpläne, plans to a Nazi superweapon. You are tasked with delivering the plans to the Resistance’s British contact who will take it to Allied intelligence. If you get there in time the Allies can use the weapons for themselves and end the war before its too late! Vive la France!
